transforms.code:
# Convert the dataset to a Python list of dictionaries
    pyData = system.dataset.toPyDataSet(value)

    # Check if there is at least one row returned
    if len(pyData) > 0:
        row = pyData[0]
        assetcount = row['assetcount']
        sitecount = row['sitecount']
        return "Wind: {} assets in {} sites".format(assetcount, sitecount)

    # Fallback if no data
    return "Wind: 0 assets in 0 sites"
